info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:59PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Roosevelt, east central Valley, southwestern Sheridan and northwestern Richland Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 459 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Bredette, or 21 miles northwest of Poplar, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brockton, Lustre and Volt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
